de.must.io
Class TextFile

java.lang.Object
  de.must.io.TextFile

public class TextFile
extends java.lang.Object

Text file for input use. 


 Sample:
     textFile = new TextFile("Xy.txt");
     String temp;
     while ((temp = textFile.readLine()) != null) {
       list.addItem(temp);
     }

See Also:
DataTextObject, DataTextObjectWithDelimiter
